item.title: {[SRL] BETA} RuneScape Copper Miner FIXED ORE DROPS {BETA [SRL]}
item.dc:creator: @Sebo Sebo
item.description:
@Sebo wrote:

Hey, I think most people know who I am, I am a very new(and Young) Scripter (BTW Im 13 ) Anyways… I made a new script which I’ll Continue to update (Eventually making it a ANYMINER) But its still The First RS Script I made…

SO GET READY FOR A PRETTY BAD SCRIPT

Bugs Fixed-
Ore Drops Now.
Please be logged in…

Versions :
0.6 - Current
0.7 - Nope.

End

[scar]{+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++|
|+++++++ Sebos’ +++++++|
|++++ CopperMiner V.0.6 ++++|
|++ Setup Lines ???-??? ++|
|+ Comments: First +|
|+ Pick Must be wielded +|
|++ Real RuneScape Script ++|
|++ Based off of Weibs Powerminer ++|
|++++ Enjoy the script ++++|
|+++++++ Bugs: ++++++++|
|+++ Doesn’t Drop Ores +++|
|+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++}
{]---------------------------------[]
[] Other Stuff: []
[] I will need feedback and stuff []
[] PM me for questions or help! []
[] I’ll Be HAPPY to answer them []
[] (If I know the problem ) []
[]---------------------------------[}
{]#################################[]
[] DONT FORGET! []
[] START BY MINING SYMBOL! []
[]#################################[}

{|
| DONT TOUCH |
|}

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.Include SRL/SRL/Skill/Mining.Scar}

Procedure Setup;
Begin
SetupSRL;
SetupSRLMining;
PerfectNorth;
ClearDebug;
End;

Procedure MineRocks;
Begin
Repeat
DwarfItem;
Wait(1);
FindNormalRandoms;
Wait(1);
FindTalk;
If(FindColor(x, y, 10529968, 121, 213, 884, 711))Then
Wait(150);
FindColor(x, y, 5137051, 599, 37, 971, 117);
Wait(150);
Mouse(x, y, 3, 4, True);
Wait(2500+random(2500));
If(FindColor(x, y, 4418453, 121, 213, 884, 711))Then
Mouse(x, y, 3, 2, True);
Wait(6500+Random(6500));
Until(InvFull);
DropAll;
End;

begin
Setup;
Repeat
MineRocks;
Until(InvFull);
end.[/scar]
